cause.description:
Pheasants are a group of large birds in the order Galliformes. In many countries they are hunted as game.
Pheasant are characterised by strong sexual dimorphism, with males being highly ornate with bright colours and adornments such as wattles and long tails. However, both are quite tasty when properly prepared.
1. Feeding on pheasants is a universal right.
2. All pheasants are created equal, but some are tastier than others.
cause.mission: boost the pheasant predator population by feeding on pheasants
cause.name: Boost the pheasant predator population
